title: OpenTPX
description: An Open Threat Partner eXchange (OpenTPX) file

criticality_i.description: The threat observable’s relative criticality between 1 and 100

score_i.description: Optional overridden threat score between 1 and 100.

score_24hr_decay_i.description: Optional parameter that defines the percentage of the score decays over time if no new observation. A valid decay is between 0 and 100. A value of 0 switches off decay due to time.

score_calc_setting_s.description: Optional parameter that defines whether the score was calculated based on a manual or automatic calculation. Default: auto

description_s.description: A user displayable description of the observable

classification_c_array.description: An array of classification of this threat observable.

classification_family_s.description: The descriptive family name for this classification

score_i.description: The criticality/score of the classification between 1 and 100 where a higher number is a higher risk classification

attribute_c_map.description: An map of attributes associated with the observable that are common across all subjects

summary_s.description: A user displayable summary of the observable description

notes_s.description: A user defined set of notes that provide background to the description

reference_s_array.description: An array of string URL references to background information on the observable

asn_i.description: The ID number of the ASN

asn_routers_ip_array.description: The array of routers that make up this ASN

asn_router_conns_ip_array.description: The array of router interconnections in this ASN

asn_cidr_announcements_c_array.description: The array of CIDR announcements in this ASN

asn_downstream_i_array.description: The array of downstream ASNs from this ASN

asn_upstream_i_array.description: The array of upstream ASNs from this ASN

asn_community_c_array.description: The array of communities within this ASN

last_updated_t.description: The UTC Epoch time of the last update to this collection

author_s.description: A name associated with the last team, group, company or person making the change

workspace_s.description: A collaboration space this collection is associated with

fqdn_ref_c_array.description: An array of FQDN elements referenced by this collection

ip_ref_c_array.description: An array of IP (v4 and v6) elements referenced by this collection

asn_ref_c_array.description: An array of ASN elements referenced by this collection

cidr_ref_c_array.description: An array of CIDR elements referenced by this collection

observable_ref_c_array.description: An array of observables referenced by this collection

collection_c_array.description: An array of children collections contained within this collection

score_i.description: The element’s overridden score if not derived from scoring of the observables

score_24hr_decay_i.description: The element’s overridden score decay if not derived from the observable’s decay parameter. 0 indicates this particular element’s score will not change due to time decay alone.

threat_observable_c_map.description: A map of Threat Observables that are associated with the subject.  The threat observable must already be defined in the observable dictionary to be referenced by this map.

occurred_at_t.description: The Epoch UTC timestamp when this particular threat observable was first observed associated with the subject

last_seen_t.description: The Epoch UTC timestamp of the last update when this threat observable was observed associated with the subject

country_code_s.description: The 2 or 3 digit country code associated with the threat observable

destination_fqdn_s.description: The domain that a particular botnet or peer to peer communication threat was destined to

description_s.description: The description of the observable or element or collection

url_s.description: The description of the observable or element or collection

score_i.description: The criticality/score of the classification between 1 and 100 where a higher number is a higher risk observable

filesize_i.description: The size of a file used to convey some behavior

mime_type_s.description: The mime type of the file

hash_md5_h.description: The MD5 hash of a file

hash_sha1_h.description: The SHA1 hash of a file

hash_sha256_h.description: The SHA256 hash of a file

hash _sha512_h.description: The SHA512 hash of a file

dns_request_c_array.description: The list of DNS requests made

dns_response_c_array.description: The list of DNS responses where each response is { Dns-record-type : Dns-value}

host_c_array.description: The list of hosts in the PCAP

http_c_array.description: The list of HTTP key/value pairs in the PCAP

smtp_c_array.description: The list of SMTP key/value pairs in the PCAP

tcp_c_array.description: The list of TCP key/value pairs in the PCAP

fqdn_c_array.description: The list of SMTP key/value pairs in the PCAP

ssl_c_array.description: The list of SSL key/value pairs in the PCAP

geoloc_lat_f.description: The latitude of the observable if known

geoloc_long_f.description: The longitude of the observable if known

dest_ipv4_s.description: A destination IP v4 address as a string

dest_ipv4_i.description: A destination IP v4 address as an integer

src_ipv4_s.description: A source IP v4 address as a string

src_ipv4_i.description: A source IP v4 address as an integer

size_i.description: A size in bytes of a communication or entity

tlp_i.description: The Traffic Light Protocol value. 0 – White, 1 – Green, 2 – Amber, 3 – Red

name_id_s.description: The name of the country provided as part of a country code file

country_code_i.description: The country identifier as part of the country code file

iso_3_s.description: The ISO 3 letter code for the country

iso_2_s.description: The ISO 2 letter code for the country

region_code_i.description: The regional code for the country code file

continent_code_i.description: The continent code for the country code file

continent_code_s.description: The continent name for the country code file

naics_code_s.description: The NAICS code as a string

schema_version_s.description: The provider’s version of their schema

source_observable_s.description: The prefix associated with this threat list

source_description_s.description: A description of the source feed that provides background to the type of data, the types of information available to the user

source_file_s.description: The file containing the original feed information

score_i.description: The score of the source feed accuracy. As assessment of the source feed’s accuracy between 1 and 100 where 100 is completely accurate

last_updated_t.description: The Epoch UTC timestamp this file was last changed by the provider

distribution_time_t.description: The Epoch UTC timestamp this file was distributed by the provider

element_observable_c_array.description: An array of Element Threat Observables

asn_c_array.description: An array of ASN network information

dictionary_file_manifest.description: An array of filenames (fully qualified path) where the dictionary files are

observable_element_file_manifest.description: An array of filenames (fully qualified path) where the element observable files are

collection_file_manifest.description: An array of filenames (fully qualified path) where the collection files are

network_file_manifest.description: An array of filenames (fully qualified path) where the network files are
